title: Manifestation (Keyword)
content:
To play a card with the manifestation keyword, use (discard) a token from one of your equipped cards that has the conduit keyword.

Manifestation on Attributes

When the Manifestation keyword appears on an attribute card, you must discard a token from one of your equipped cards with the conduit keyword to commit that attribute to a test. (Note: This is not true of non-attribute cards with the manifestation keyword. Those may be committed to tests as normal without spending a token from a conduit.)
